comment.author: 95668756@N00
comment._content: That's an odd one...aircraft is a T-6 Texan also known as a Harvard. Troops I assume are US or Canadian conducting winter training.

comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: The troops are most likely Canadian (the donor of the photo was in the Canadian military during WWII). I have no idea where it was taken. Thanks for identifying the plane model.
comment.authorname: Law Society of Upper Canada Archives
